text.content: Barbie Real Lacing Cards
SKU: BB06 | Date: 2026-02-12 | Competitors: 4 | Primary Keywords: lacing cards, barbie lacing cards, sewing cards | Listing: Yes | Image Plan: Yes
Amazon Listing
Title
CRAFTILOO Barbie Lacing Cards for Kids Ages 3-5 - 8 Sewing Cards with Laces & Stickers, Fine Motor Skills Toddler Activity, Screen-Free Mess-Free Travel Craft Kit for Girls
172 characters. Front-loaded: Barbie (brand IP) + Lacing Cards (4,524/mo). Captures lacing cards for kids ages 3-5 (3,510/mo), sewing cards (755/mo).
Bullet Points

[Barbie Appeal] BARBIE LACING CARDS FOR KIDS â€” Introduce your child to lacing with the world's most recognized doll. This officially licensed Barbie kit features 8 beautifully designed lacing cards with real Barbie photography â€” not just illustrations. Each card has large, pre-punched holes sized for small hands. No other lacing card on Amazon features licensed characters.

[What's Included] COMPLETE KIT â€” EVERYTHING INCLUDED: 8 thick Barbie-themed lacing cards with pre-punched holes, 8 colorful laces, transparent decorative stickers, and instructions. All in an official Barbie color box that doubles as storage. The transparent stickers add a unique decorating step no other kit offers.

[Motor Skills] BUILDS FINE MOTOR SKILLS FOR AGES 3+: Develops hand-eye coordination, threading ability, color recognition, and patience. Large pre-punched holes make threading easy for beginners. Recommended for occupational therapy, kindergarten readiness, and Montessori-style learning.
[Screen-Free] SCREEN-FREE, MESS-FREE ACTIVITY: No glue, no paint, no cleanup. Compact for car rides, airplane trips, waiting rooms, and quiet time. Each card keeps children engaged without screens.

[Gift Ready] GIFT-READY BARBIE PACKAGING: Official Barbie packaging â€” ready to gift for birthdays, Christmas, Easter baskets, and party favors. Child-safe, tested materials. Grandparents, parents, and teachers love it.
